item.title: Want to Win a Pitch? Ignore the Pitch.
item.description: For many startups, pitch competitions are a vital source of funding. They provide access to capital, much of the time without taking equity. Plus they provide a vital arena for gathering constructive criticism on your concept. So what can your organization do to have the best possible shot at taking home 1st place, and maybe even a big cardboard check? Ignore the Pitch But why?
